projects.name: Mera Dhaba - An Online Food Ordering App
projects.description: Add to Cart Feature: Implemented a seamless add to cart functionality allowing users to easily select and order their desired food items. Encrypted Passwords: Ensured secure user data handling by encrypting passwords to protect user privacy and security using Bcrypt JS. Login Authentication: Used JSON Web Token for login authentication mechanisms to verify user identities and ensure secure access to the application.

projects.name: MereTask- A Todo List
projects.description: MereTask empowers you to stay organized and focused digitally. Streamline your tasks effortlessly with this intuitive and minimalist to-do list. Designed for efficiency, MereTask helps prioritize, categorize, and track your daily responsibilities effortlessly. Its sleek interface and user-friendly features facilitate managing your tasks with ease. .Whether you're juggling work, school, or personal projects, MereTask enables you to stay on top of your commitments and achieve your goals with precision. Simplify your life and boost your productivity with MereTask today.
